doc.name: hiliteFill

syntax.example: set the hiliteFill of button to {true | false}

doc.summary: Specifies whether a button's background is filled with the hiliteColor and hilitePattern when the button is highlighted.

examples.example: set the hiliteFill of last button to false

description.p: Use the hiliteFill property to change the appearance a button has when it is highlighted.
The hiliteFill of a button is true or false.
By default, the hiliteFill of a newly created button is set to true.

The hiliteFill property affects only the background of a button. If a button's hiliteFill property is false, its text changes color when highlighted, but its background color or pattern does not change.
